title: Fushigi na Neko no Machi Meltier
description: This is the cat town of "Meltier". Moco, who has no memories of the past, starts helping out at a caf√© in the town. There, she encounters many unique and delightful kitten friends! A slightly mysterious and exceptionally happy heartwarming everyday fairy tale fantasy!
author: Sakura Oriko

1.title: Nice To Meet You, Cat Town
